headline: 3M (MMM): Reassessing Valuation After a 25% Year-to-Date Share Price Rebound
summary: 3M (MMM) has quietly shifted higher over the past year, delivering roughly 28% total return while still trading at a discount to some valuation models. That mix of recovery and perceived value has investors taking notice. See our latest analysis for 3M. That steady climb in total shareholder return, alongside a roughly 25% year to date share price gain, suggests sentiment is improving as investors reassess 3M’s growth prospects and legal risk overhang at a still modest valuation.
